text: Daisy Duck is a cartoon character created in 1940 at Walt Disney Animation Studios. Daisy made her official debut (an earlier love interest for Donald called Donna was introduced in the 1937 short "Don Donald") in the 1940 short Mr. Duck Steps Out. ==Related pages== * Walt Disney Pictures * List of Disney movies Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1940 Duck, Daisy Duck, Daisy
title: Daisy Duck
